document.full_text: baseball hall of famer yogi berra was released from hospital and pronounced ok after a brief stay as a precaution thursday after the 85-year-old former yankee slipped and fell before a spring training game.
document.title: no serious boo boo for berra in spring fall
lines_and_colors: baseball hall of famer yogi berra was released from hospital and pronounced ok after a brief stay as a precaution thursday after the 85-year-old former yankee slipped and fell before a spring training game.
